Title.evidence: S0220 was designed to incorporate an active systemic agent, (docetaxel) as consolidation therapy.

Trial_Design.evidence: The accrual goal was 45 eligible patients.

Participants.evidence: Patients with histologically-proven and radiologically-defined T3-T4, N0-N1, M0 SS NSCLC underwent induction therapy.

Intervention.evidence: Induction therapy with cisplatin-etoposide, concurrently with thoracic RT 45 Gy. Non-progressing patients underwent surgical resection within 7 weeks. Consolidation consisted of docetaxel every 3 weeks for 3 doses.

Number_Randomised.evidence: Of 46 patients registered, 44 were eligible and assessable; 38 (86%) completed induction.

Number_Analysed.evidence: Of 46 patients registered, 44 were eligible and assessable; 38 (86%) completed induction.

Result_Outcome.evidence: The 3-year progression-free survival is 56% and 3-year overall survival is 61%.
